content.en: Prolog parsing algorithms: Parsing algorithms in Prolog are explored to understand their different approaches and characteristics. The implementation model of Prolog computation is investigated to find ways to optimize it. The suitability of logic programming and constraint logic programming for representing calendrical algorithms and data is compared.
content.da: Prolog-parsingsalgoritmer: Parsingsalgoritmer i Prolog undersøges for at forstå deres forskellige tilgange og karakteristika. Implementeringsmodellen af Prolog-beregning undersøges for at finde måder at optimere den på. Egnetheden af logisk programmering og constraint logisk programmering til at repræsentere kalendriske algoritmer og data sammenlignes.
